Interface Functions
[The FastFormat (C++) Application Layer]


Modules

 Format API Interface Functions
 The Format API consists of two suites of N-ary Generated Function Templates whose names are fmt() and fmtln().
 Write API Interface Functions
 The Write API consists of two suites of N-ary Generated Function Templates whose names are write() and writeln().

Functions

template<typename S>
S & flush (S &sink)
 Flushes the given sink, by formatting an empty statement with the flag fastformat::flags::ff_flush.

Function Documentation

S& fastformat::flush ( S &  sink  )  [inline]

Flushes the given sink, by formatting an empty statement with the flag fastformat::flags::ff_flush.
